entry.title: Invitation to higher local fields (Introduction)
entry.summary: The monograph "Invitation to higher local fields" is the result of the conference on higher local fields held in Muenster, August 29 to September 5, 1999. The aim is to provide an introduction to higher local fields (more generally complete discrete valuation fields with arbitrary residue field) and render the main ideas of this theory (Part I), as well as to discuss several applications and connections to other areas (Part II). The volume grew as an extended version of talks given at the conference. The two parts are separated by a paper of K. Kato, an IHES preprint from 1980 which has never been published. We hope that the volume will be a useful introduction and guide to the subject. The contributions to this volume were received over the period November 1999 to August 2000 and the electronic publication date is 10 December 2000. This is the introduction: math.NT/0012131. Other arXiv references are as follows: Part I: Sections 1: math.NT/0012132, 2: math.NT/0012133, A: math.NT/0012134, 4: math.NT/0012135, 5: math.NT/0012136, 6: math.NT/0012137, 7: math.NT/0012138, 8: math.NT/0012139, 9: math.NT/0012140, 10: math.NT/0012141, 11: math.NT/0012142, 12: math.NT/0012143, 13: math.NT/0012144, 14: math.NT/0012145, 15: math.NT/0012146, 16: math.NT/0012147, 17: math.NT/0012148, 18: math.NT/0012149 . Interlude: math.NT/0012150 . Part II: Sections 1: math.NT/0012151, 2: math.NT/0012152, 3: math.NT/0012153, 4: math.NT/0012154, 5: math.NT/0012155, 6: math.NT/0012156, 7: math.NT/0012157, 8: math.NT/0012158, 9: math.NT/0012159, 10: math.NT/0012160 .
entry.arxiv:comment: Published by Geometry and Topology Monographs at http://www.maths.warwick.ac.uk/gt/gtmcontents3.html

entry.title: Rank 3 filtered $(\varphi,N)$-modules
entry.summary: We classify 3-dimensional semistable Frob-semisimple representations of $G_{\mathbb{Q}_{p^{f}}}.$

entry.title: Limits of residually irreducible p-adic Galois representations
entry.summary: In this note we produce examples of converging sequences of Galois representations, and study some of their properties. Some of the results here are used in the preprint math.NT/0210296.

entry.title: Idempotent relations and generalized p-ranks of curves
entry.summary: This paper has been superseded by math.NT/0205008

entry.title: Invitation to higher local fields, Part II, section 8: Higher local skew fields
entry.summary: This work studies two dimensional local skew fields and their automorphisms.
entry.arxiv:comment: For introduction and notation, see math.NT/0012131 . Published by Geometry and Topology Monographs at http://www.maths.warwick.ac.uk/gt/GTMon3/m3-II-8.abs.html

entry.title: An Improvement for the Large Sieve for Square Moduli
entry.summary: We establish a result on the large sieve with square moduli. These bounds impro ve recent results by S. Baier(math.NT/0512228) and L. Zhao(math.NT/0508125).
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages. Corrected some minor typographic errors
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: J. Number Theory, Vol. 128, No. 1, 2008, pp. 154-174.

entry.title: Examples of finite $p$-divisible sets of MHS
entry.summary: We provide some examples which give evidence to the conjectures contained in my paper "Finiteness of $p$-Divisible Sets of Multiple Harmonic Sums" (math.NT/0303043). All the main theoretical results can be found in that paper.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a supplementary file to the paper math.NT/0303043

entry.title: Safarevic's theorem on solvable groups as Galois groups
entry.summary: In this paper we present a complete proof of I.R.Safarevic's famous theorem that every finite solvable group occurs as a Galois group over Q.

entry.title: Congruences between Selmer groups
entry.summary: In this paper we study when two congruent $l$-adic Galois representations have congruent Selmer groups. We obtain results for representations from cyclotomic characters, Hecke characters and adjoints of modular forms.

entry.title: Mod 2 representations of elliptic curves
entry.summary: This note gives explicit equations for the elliptic curves (in characteristic not 2 or 3) with mod 2 representation isomorphic to that of a given one.

entry.title: Points of bounded height on equivariant compactifications of vector groups, II
entry.summary: We prove asymptotic formulas for the number of rational points of bounded height on certain blow-ups of the projective space.

entry.title: Explicit local heights
entry.summary: A new proof is given for the explicit formulae for the non-archimedean canonical height on an elliptic curve. This arises as a direct calculation of the Haar integral in the elliptic Jensen formula.

entry.title: Combinatorial $L^2$-determinants
entry.summary: We show that the zeta function of a regular graph admits a representation as a quotient of a determinant over a $L^2$-determinant of the combinatorial Laplacian.
entry.arxiv:comment: LATEX, 11 pages, to appear in: Proc. Edinburgh Math. Soc

entry.title: A simple trace formula for arithmetic groups
entry.summary: We deduce from Arthur's trace formula a formula with only orbital integrals on the geometric side.

entry.title: Ranks of elliptic curves in families of quadratic twists
entry.summary: We show that the unboundedness of the ranks of the quadratic twists of an elliptic curve is equivalent to the divergence of certain infinite series.

entry.title: Beyond pair correlation
entry.summary: The authors study the distribution of psi(x+h)-psi(x)-h and compare it with numerical data.

entry.title: Class numbers of orders in cubic fields
entry.summary: We give an asymptotic formula for class numbers of orders in cubic number fields.

entry.title: Free product of absolute Galois groups
entry.summary: The free profinite product of finitely many absolute Galois group is an absolute Galois group.

entry.title: Towers of function fields with extremal properties
entry.summary: Certain towers of function fields with complete splitting of rational places at each stage are constructed. Also, families oof towers with positive N/g ratios are described.

entry.title: 2-extensions with many points
entry.summary: We give defining equations for function fields over finite fields with many rational places. They are obtained from composita of quadratic extensions of the rational function field.

entry.title: Non-existence of certain semistable abelian varieties
entry.summary: We show that there do not exist semistable varietes defined over the rationals with good reduction outside one prime p if p = 2, 3, 5 or 7.

entry.title: Formules pour les nombres premiers
entry.summary: The distribution of prime numbers is here considered. We show a formula for $li^{-1}$ and we study the $\pi(x)$ function and Riemann's hypothesis.

entry.title: The Eratosthenes Progression p_{k+1} = π^{-1}(p_k), k=0,1,2,..., p_0 \in N \setminus P Determines An Inner Prime Number Distribution Law
entry.summary: Formulas of $\pi(x)$-fine structure are presented.

entry.title: Factorization of integers and arithmetic functions
entry.summary: Elementary proofs of unique factorization in rings of arithmetic functions using a simple variant of Euclid's proof for the fundamental theorem of arithmetic.

entry.title: Products of Factorials Modulo p
entry.summary: A study of products of factorials modulo p and complete residues.

entry.title: On Cebotarev sets
entry.summary: In this paper we define a topology with sufficiently good properties on the set of prime ideals of a number field.

entry.title: Borcherds products associated with certain Thompson series
entry.summary: We apply Zagier's result for the traces of singular moduli to construct Borcherds products in higher level cases.

entry.title: Height zeta functions of equivariant compactifications of the Heisenberg group
entry.summary: We study analytic properties of height zeta functions of equivariant compactifications of the Heisenberg group.

entry.title: Filtrations de type Hasse-Arf et monodromie p-adique
entry.summary: One proves the Crew-Tsuzuki "p-adic local monodromy conjecture" (for local fields of characteristic p>0).

entry.title: Burns' equivariant Tamagawa invariant T Omega^{loc}(N/\Q,1) for some quaternion fields
entry.summary: We verify one of Burn's equivariant Tamagawa number conjectures for some families of quaternion fields.

entry.title: More precise Pair Correlation Conjecture
entry.summary: In this paper, we derive a more precise version of the Strong Pair Correlation Conjecture on the zeros of the Riemann zeta function under Riemann Hypothesis and Twin Prime Conjecture.

entry.title: Higher correlations of divisor sums related to primes III: k-correlations
entry.summary: We obtain the general k-correlations for a short divisor sum related to primes.

entry.title: Selberg zeta functions for spaces of higher rank
entry.summary: The theory of Selberg zeta functions is generalized to higher rank spaces. Applications towards analytic torsion numbers are given.

entry.title: Modularity of p-adic Galois representations via p-adic approximations
entry.summary: We give a direct approach to recover some of the results of Wiles and Tayor on modularity of certain 2-dimensional p-adic representations of the absolute Galois group of Q.

entry.title: Why everyone should know number theory
entry.summary: This was an expository lecture for the graduate student colloquium at the University of Arizona on the topic of numbers.

entry.title: Diophantine equations in two variables
entry.summary: This is an expository lecture on the subject of the title delivered at the Park-IAS mathematical institute in Princeton (July, 2000).

entry.title: Zeta Correspondences in Rank-n
entry.summary: The purpose of this work is to study in the case of function fields and rank-$n$, certain correspondences associated with Jacobi sums in a Coleman's work.

entry.title: Strongly modular lattices with long shadow
entry.summary: We classify strongly modular lattices with longest and second longest possible shadow.

entry.title: Automorphisms of $X_0^*(p)$
entry.summary: We determine the automorphism group of the modular curve $X_0^*(p)$ for all prime numbers $p$.

entry.title: Omega results for the divisor and circle problems
entry.summary: We obtain new omega results for the error terms in two classical lattice point problems. These results are likely to be the best possible.

entry.title: Existence d'une courbe de genre 5 sur F_3 avec 13 points rationnels
entry.summary: Let N_q(g) the maximal number of points on a genus g curve over F_q. We prove that N_3(5)=13.

entry.title: Existence de F-cristaux avec structures supplementaires
entry.summary: In this article, we prove under some hypothesis of non ramification, a conjecture of Kottwitz and Rapoport giving the existence of crystals with additional structures.

entry.title: Rationality of partial zeta functions
entry.summary: We prove that the partial zeta function introduced in [9] is a rational function, generalizing Dwork's rationality theorem.

entry.title: Modular congruences, Q-curves, and the diophantine equation x^4 + y^4 = z^p
entry.summary: We prove two results concerning the generalized Fermat equation $x^4+y^4=z^p$. In particular we prove that the First Case is true if $p \neq 7$.

entry.title: Fast proof of functional equation for $ζ(s)$
entry.summary: A quite fast proof of the functional equation of the Riemann zeta function. It is a modification of a proof usually overlooked in Titchmarsh's monograph.
entry.arxiv:comment: Expected to be useful for presentation in class

entry.title: Degree 1 elements of the Selberg class
entry.summary: We provide a short and simple proof of a beautiful result of Kaczorowski and Perelli classifying the elements of degree one in the Selberg class.

entry.title: On Maslanka's representation for the Riemann zeta-function
entry.summary: A rigorous proof is given of the hypergeometric-like representation of the Riemann-zeta function discovered by K. Maslanka.

entry.title: On the local factor of the zeta function of quadratic orders
entry.summary: We prove by an elementary method the Riemann hypothesis for the local Euler factor of the zeta function of quadratic orders.

entry.title: Galois characterization of Endoscopy for rational Siegel modular forms
entry.summary: We establish a relation between Galois reducibility and Endoscopy for genus 2 Siegel cusp forms which have rational eigenvalues and are unramified at 3

entry.title: Higher Descent on Pell Conics III. The First 2-Descent
entry.summary: In this articel we describe the first 2-descent on Pell conics, and compute the associated 2-part of the Tate-Shafarevich group.

entry.title: Ramunajan $(n_1,n_2,...,n_{d-1})$-regular hypergraphs based on Bruhat-Tits Buildings of type $\tilde{A}_{d-1}$
entry.summary: In this paper I study Ramanujan hypergraps and both abstract and explicit constructions is given.

entry.title: Une region explicite sans zero pour la fonction Zeta de Riemann
entry.summary: The Riemann Zeta function $\zeta(s)$ never vanishes in the region : $$ \Re s \ge 1- \frac1{5.70176 \log |\Im s|} \quad \quad (|\Im s| \ge 2). $$

entry.title: Positivity of Heights of Semistable Varieties
entry.summary: We completely solve a problem of S. Zhang about the positivity of a normalized height on the moduli space of semistable varieties of given degree and given dimension.

entry.title: A generalisation of a congruence due to Vantieghem only holding for primes
entry.summary: In this note we present a family of congruences which hold if and only if a natural number $n$ is prime.

entry.title: Finite automata and relations of multiple zeta values
entry.summary: The theory of finite automata applies to the study on relations of multiple zeta values.

entry.title: A proof of Hadjicostas's conjecture
entry.summary: We prove a recent conjecture of Hadjicostas concerning a double integral formula involving the zeta and the gamma functions.

entry.title: There Are Infinitely Many Prime Twins
entry.summary: A serious error has been found in the paper, specifically, Lemma 8 is incorrect.

entry.title: Analogy between arithmetic of elliptic curves and conics
entry.summary: In this brief note we bring out the analogy between the arithmetic of elliptic curves and the Riemann zeta-function.

entry.title: Graphical patterns in quadratic residues
entry.summary: Plots of quadratic residues display some features that are analyzed mathematically.

entry.title: Spinor L functions, theta correspondence, and Bessel coefficients
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the entireness of the Spinor L function of certain generic representations of the group GSp(4) over a totally real field.

entry.title: The Local Lehmer Inequality For Drinfeld Modules
entry.summary: We give a lower bound for the local height of a non-torsion element of a Drinfeld module.

entry.title: Towards a $p$-adic Langlands programme
entry.summary: These are the notes for an eponymous course given by the authors at the summer school on p-adic arithmetic geometry in Hangzhou.

entry.title: On a multiple harmonic power series
entry.summary: The formulas discussed in the previous version are not new.

entry.title: Extreme values of $|ζ(1+it)|$
entry.summary: Improving a result of N. Levinson, we exhibit large and small values of $|\zeta(1+it)|$.
entry.arxiv:comment: Dedicated to Professor K. Ramachandra on the occasion of his seventieth birthday

entry.title: Sums of powers of consecutive q-integers
entry.summary: We give the q-analogue of the sums of the n-th powers of positive integers up to k-1.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Advanced Studies in Contemporary Mathematics, 9(2004), no. 1, p. 15-18

entry.title: A New approach to q-zeta function
entry.summary: We construct the new q-extension of Bernoulli numbers and polynomials in this paper. Finally we consider the q-zeta functions which interpolate the new q-extension of Bernoulli numbers and polynomials.

entry.title: Note on the Prime Number Theorem
entry.summary: We survey the classical results on the prime number theorem

entry.title: q-analogues of the sums of powers of consecutive integers
entry.summary: Following an idea due to J. Bernoulli, we explore the q-analogue of the sums of powers of consecutive integers.

entry.title: Barnes' type multiple Changhee q-zeta functiond
entry.summary: We construct Barnes' type Changhee q-zeta function.

entry.title: On the twisted $q$-zeta functions and $q$-Bernoulli polynomials
entry.summary: We study the twisted q-zeta functions and twisted q-Bernoulli polynomials

entry.title: On the explicit formula of Euler numbers and polynomials of higher order
entry.summary: We study the explicit formula of Euler numbers and polynomials of higher order

entry.title: A note on q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials
entry.summary: By using p-adic q-integrals, we study the q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials of higher order.

entry.title: On a p-adic interpolation function for the q-extension of the generalized Bernoulli polynomials and Its derivative
entry.summary: We construct the q-extension of the Hurwitz's type L-function which interpolates the q-extension of generalized Bernoulli polynomials attached to $chi$.

entry.title: On Evaluation of Nonlinear Exponential Sums
entry.summary: This paper provides a technique for evaluating some nonlinear Gaussian sums in closed forms. The evaluation is obtained from the known values of simpler exponential sums.

entry.title: The $p$-adic CM-method for genus 2
entry.summary: We present a nonarchimedian method to construct hyperelliptic CM-curves of genus 2.

entry.title: Some binomial series obtained by the WZ-method
entry.summary: Using the WZ-method we find some of the easiest Ramanujan's formulae and also some new interesting Ramanujan-like sums.

entry.title: Probable Counterexamples of the ABC Conjecture
entry.summary: This paper describes a method used to construct infinitely many probable counterexamples of the abc conjecture over the rational integers.

entry.title: Low dimensional strongly perfect lattices. I: The 12-dimensional case
entry.summary: It is shown that the Coxeter-Todd lattice is the unique strongly perfect lattice in dimension 12.

entry.title: On Serre's modularity conjecture for 2-dimensional mod p representations of G_Q unramified outside p
entry.summary: We prove the level 1 case of Serre's conjecture.

entry.title: Regularized product expressions of higher Riemann zeta functions
entry.summary: As a generalization of [KMW], we introduce a higher Riemann zeta function for an abstract sequence. Then we explicitly determine its regularized product expression.

entry.title: Representation of modular invariant function by generators of a modular function field
entry.summary: We give a method of representing the modular invariant function by generators of a modular function field.

entry.title: Multivariate p-dic L-function
entry.summary: We construct multivariate p-adic L-function in the p-adic number fild by using Washington method.

entry.title: Lefschetz formulae for p-adic groups
entry.summary: Lefschetz formulae for torus actions on p-adic groups are proven.

entry.title: A note on q-Volkenborn integration
entry.summary: In this paper, we construct the new $q$-analogue of the ordinary Euler numbers and polynomials by using the $q$-Volkenborn integrals.

entry.title: The fourth moment of Dirichlet $L$-functions
entry.summary: Extending a result of Heath-Brown, we establish an asymptotic formula for the fourth moment of central values of Dirichlet $L$-functions attached to primitive characters $\pmod q$.

entry.title: A q-analogue of Wolstenholme's harmonic series congruence
entry.summary: We establish a q-analogue of Wolstenholme's harmonic series congruence.

entry.title: Arbitrarily Long Arithmetic Progressions of Primes on the Nose
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn

entry.title: A note on the alternating sums of powers of consecutive integers
entry.summary: Following an idea due to Euler, we evaluate the alternating sums of powers of consrcutive integers.

entry.title: Metric Diophantine approximation over a local field of positive characteristic
entry.summary: We estalish the conjectures of Sprindzhuk over a local field of positive characteristic using the dynamical method of Kleinbock-Margulis.

entry.title: A Khintchine type theorem for hyperplanes
entry.summary: We prove that the convergence Khintchine theorem holds for affine hyperplanes whose parametrizing matrices satisfy a mild Diophantine condition. We use the dynamical method of Kleinbock-Margulis.

entry.title: Degeneration of polylogarithms and special values of L-functions for totally real fields
entry.summary: Replaced by revised version.

entry.title: On uniform distribution modulo one
entry.summary: We introduce an elementary argument to the theory of distribution of sequences modulo one.

entry.title: On Some Generalizations of Fermat's, Lucas's and Wilson's Theorems
entry.summary: We use actions by finite cyclic groups to derive generalizations of three classical theorems from elementary number theory.

entry.title: A Method of Generating Sums of Like Powers
entry.summary: In this article a new method of generating sums of like powers is presented.

entry.title: The Tate-Voloch Conjecture for Drinfeld modules
entry.summary: We study the $v$-adic distance from the torsion of a Drinfeld module to an affine variety.

entry.title: A p-adic Height Function Of Cryptanalytic Significance
entry.summary: It is noted that an efficient algorithm for calculating a $p$-adic height could have cryptanalytic applications.

entry.title: A Note on Arithmetical Properties of Multiple Zeta Values
entry.summary: We prove an easy but interesting result about the linear independence of multiple zeta values of different weights.

entry.title: Lower bounds for moments of L-functions: symplectic and orthogonal examples
entry.summary: We give lower bounds of the conjectured order of magnitude for an orthogonal and a symplectic family of L-functions.

entry.title: p-adic l-functions and sums of powers
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to give the explicit formulae of p-adic l-functions and sums of powers which are related to Euler numbers.

entry.title: On the analogs of Euler numbers and polynomials associated with p-adic integrals on the rings of p-adic integers at q=-1
entry.summary: We will study p-adic invariant integerals involving trigonometric functions

entry.title: On p-adic q-l-functions and sums of powers, II
entry.summary: In this paper, we study a new p-adic q-l-functions and sums of powers.

entry.title: Partial zeta functions
entry.summary: In the present manuscript, we study analytic properties of zeta functions defined by partial Euler products.

entry.title: Note on some congruences of Lehmer
entry.summary: In the paper, we generalize some congruences of Lehmer for general composite numbers.

entry.title: A generalization of Wolstenholme's harmonic series congruence
entry.summary: We give a generalization of Wolstenholme's harmonic series congruence for the Lucas sequences.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages, to appear in Rocky Mountain Journal of Mathematics

entry.title: Trivial factors for L-functions of symmetric products of Kloosterman sheaves
entry.summary: We calculate the trivial factors of the L-functions for both finite and p-adic infinite symmetric products of the Kloosterman sheaf.

entry.title: On some systems of difference equations
entry.summary: The work studies some Difference equations, which are connected with Mejer's function.
entry.arxiv:comment: 5 pages, 0 figures, extraction of my talk on the International Conference in memory of Professor N.M.Korobov

entry.title: Note on Integer Factoring Methods I
entry.summary: This note presents the basic mathematical structure of a new integer factorization method based on systems of linear Diophantine equations.

entry.title: Exponents of Diophantine approximation
entry.summary: The paper is mostly a survey on recent results in Diophantine approximation, with emphasis on properties of exponents measuring various notions of Diophantine <approximation.

entry.title: Asymptotics of various partitions
entry.summary: Asymptotic formulas of the number of various partitions are studied, like 3-colored partitions, concave partitions, certain plane partitions, partitions without small parts, the number of p-rings.

entry.title: Statistical regularities in the zeta zeros
entry.summary: Numerical investigations around a transformation of Landau's formula suggest certain statistical regularities in the distribution of zeros of the Riemann zeta function.

entry.title: Drinfeld Modular Polynomials in Higher Rank
entry.summary: We study modular polynomials classifying cyclic isogenies between Drinfeld modules of arbitrary rank over the ring F_q[T].

entry.title: On the growth of modular symbols
entry.summary: It is shown that the modular symbol of a cusp form of weight two has logarithmic growth.

entry.title: The eigencurve is proper at integral weights
entry.summary: We prove that the Coleman-Mazur eigencurve is proper (over weight space) at integral weights in the center of weight space.

entry.title: A Cylcotomic Investigation of the Fermat - Catalan Equation
entry.summary: We give some new, simple results on the equation X^p + Y^p = Z^q.

entry.title: A note on the q-Genocchi numbers and polynomials
entry.summary: In ths paper we discuss the new concept of the q-extension of Genocchi numbers and give the some relations between q-Genocchi polynomials and q-Euler numbers.

entry.title: Chen's double sieve, Goldbach's conjecture and the twin prime problem
entry.summary: We give a more comrehensive treatment of Chen's double sieve and improve related constants in Goldbach's conjecture and the twin prime problem.

entry.title: On the Landau-Siegel Zeros Conjecture
entry.summary: We provide a proof of a variant of the Landau-Siegel Zeros conjecture.

entry.title: A Conjecture on Primes and a Step towards Justification
entry.summary: We put a new conjecture on primes from the point of view of its binary expansions and make a step towards justification.

entry.title: Extreme values of zeta prime rho
entry.summary: In this article we exhibit small and large values of $\zeta'(\rho)$ by applying Soundararajan's resonance method. Our results assume the Riemann hypothesis.

entry.title: Quelques mathématiques de la cryptographie à clés publiques
entry.summary: I present examples of mathematical objects that are of interest for public key cryptography. Text for the Journ\'ee Annuelle 2007 of the SMF.

entry.title: An exact geometric mass formula
entry.summary: We show an exact geometric mass formula for superspecial points in the reduction of any quaternionic Shimura variety modulo at a good prime $p$.

entry.title: A note on p-adic q-integrals associated with q-Euler numbers
entry.summary: In this we give a detailed proof of fermionic p-adic q-measures on Z_p and we will treat some interesting formulae related q-extension of Euler numbers and polynomials.

entry.title: Triangles with two given integral sides
entry.summary: We study some Diophantine problems related to triangles with two given integral sides. We solve two problems posed by Zolt\'an Bertalan and we also provide some generalization.

entry.title: The Norm Index Theorem (An Analytic Proof)
entry.summary: We give an analytic proof of the norm index theorem $[I_:K^* N(I_L)] =[L:K]$ for cyclic extensions of number fields using spectral theory of the idele class group.

entry.title: On Excess of the Odious Primes
entry.summary: We give a more strong heuristic justification of our conjecture on the excess of the odious primes.

entry.title: Remark on fundamental groups and effective Diophantine methods for hyperbolic curves
entry.summary: We discuss how non-commutative fundamental groups could eventually contribute to algorithms for finding rational points on hyperbolic curves.

entry.title: Carlitz q-Bernoulli numbers and q-Stirling numbers
entry.summary: In this paper we consider carlitz q-Bernoulli numbers and q-stirling numbers of the first and the second kind. From these numbers we derive many interesting formulae associated with q-Bernoulli numbers.

entry.title: The Classification of Higher Order Modular Forms and their Cohomology
entry.summary: We construct bases for the spaces of higher order modular forms of all orders and weights. We also provide a cohomological interpretation of these forms.

entry.title: Manin's conjecture for a quintic del Pezzo surface with A_2 singularity
entry.summary: Manin's conjecture is proved for a split del Pezzo surface of degree 5 with a singularity of type A_2.

entry.title: On some explicit evaluations of multiple zeta-star values
entry.summary: In this paper, we give some explicit evaluations of multiple zeta-star values which are rational multiple of powers of $\pi^2$.

entry.title: q-Bernoulli numbers and Stirling numbers(2)
entry.summary: In this paper we study q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials related to q-Stirling numbers. From thsese studying we investigate some interesting q-stirling numbers' identities related to q-Bernoulli numbers.

entry.title: A note on the p-adic log-gamma functions
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that q-Euler numbers are occured in the coefficients of some stirling type seies for p-adic analytic q-log gamma function

entry.title: Inductive Methods and zero-sum free sequences
entry.summary: We obtain a decidability result for the Davenport constant.

entry.title: Explicit matrices for Hecke operators on Siegel modular forms
entry.summary: We present an explicit set of matrices giving the action of the Hecke operators $T(p)$, $T_j(p^2)$ on Siegel modular forms.

entry.title: Computing Humbert Surfaces
entry.summary: We describe an algorithm which computes components of Humbert surfaces in terms of Rosenhain invariants, based on Runge's method

entry.title: Tate-Shafarevich groups and K3 surfaces
entry.summary: Following (and elaborating on) a method of Logan and van Luijk, we exhibit explicit genus-2 curves whose Jacobians have nontrivial 2-torsion in their Tate-Shafarevich groups.

entry.title: Symmetry p-adic invariant integral on Z_p for Bernoulli and euler polynomials
entry.summary: The main purpose of this paper is to investigate several further interesting properties of symmetry for the p-adic invariant integral on Z_p.

entry.title: Note sur la conjecture de Leopoldt
entry.summary: We prove that number fields with arbitrary degree but weak ramification satisfy the Leopoldt conjecture on the l-adic rank of the group of units

entry.title: Control Theorems for Abelian Varieties over Function Fields
entry.summary: We prove control theorems for abelian varieties over function fields.

entry.title: Unitary super perfect numbers
entry.summary: We shall show that 9, 165 are all of the odd unitary super perfect numbers.

entry.title: q-Analogue of Gauss' Divisibility Theorem
entry.summary: We give a q-analogue of Gauss' divisibility theorem

entry.title: An Identity of the Symmetry for the Frobenius-Euler polynomials associated with the fermionic p-adic invariant q-integrals on Z_p
entry.summary: The main purpose of this paper is to prove an identity of symmetry for the Frobenius-Euler polynomials.

entry.title: On a variance for twins of $k-$free numbers in arithmetic progressions
entry.summary: In this paper, we give a new upper bound of Barban-Davenport-Halberstam type for twins of $k-$free numbers in arithmetic progressions.

entry.title: On the Form of Odd Perfect Gaussian Integers
entry.summary: We extend the sum-of-divisors function to the complex plane via the Gaussian integers. Then we prove a modified form of Euler's classification of odd perfect numbers.

entry.title: New examples of p-adically rigid automorphic forms
entry.summary: We give examples of cohomological automorphic forms for unitary groups which are $p$-adically rigid.

entry.title: Asymptotics of the number of partitions into p-cores and some trigonometric sums
entry.summary: An asymptotic formula for the number of partitions into p-cores is derived. As a byproduct some integer valued trigonometric sums are found

entry.title: Diophantine Exponents of Affine Subspaces: The Simultaneous Approximation Case
entry.summary: We apply nondivergence estimates for flows on homogeneous spaces to compute Diophantine exponents of affine subspaces of $\R^n$ and their nondegenerate submanifolds.

entry.title: Multiplicative Diophantine Exponents of Hyperplanes
entry.summary: We study multiplicative Diophantine approximation property of vectors and compute Diophantine exponents of hyperplanes via dynamics.

entry.title: Convexity bounds for L-functions
entry.summary: We give a sharp convexity estimate for L-functions which have a functional equation and an Euler product.

entry.title: Christoffel words and Markoff triples
entry.summary: Markoff triples are parametrized uniquely by Christoffel words.

entry.title: Badly approximable numbers related to the Littlewood conjecture
entry.summary: By means of Peres-Schlag's method we prove the existence of real numbers $\alpha, \beta$ such that $$ \liminf_{q\to \infty} (q\log^2 q)||\alpha q|| ||\beta q|| > 0.

entry.title: Galois groups over function fields of positive characteristic
entry.summary: We describe examples motivated by the work of Serre and Abhyankar.

entry.title: On distribution of fractional parts of linear forms
entry.summary: We prove a result on linear forms related to Peres-Schlag's theorem on badly approximable numbers with respect to lacunary sequences.

entry.title: Note on on Dedekind type DC sums
entry.summary: In this paper we consider Dedekind type DC sums and prove receprocity laws related to DC sums.

entry.title: Polynomials a la Lehmers and Wilf
entry.summary: We show that a period polynomial introduced by the Lehmers coincides with a generalized Wilf polynomial.

entry.title: Endomorphisms of exceptional $D$-elliptic sheaves
entry.summary: We relate the endomorphism rings of certain $D$-elliptic sheaves of finite characteristic to hereditary orders in central division algebras over function fields.

entry.title: On The Symmetry Of Arithmetical Functions In Almost All Short Intervals, V
entry.summary: We study the symmetry in short intervals of arithmetic functions with non-negative exponential sums.

entry.title: Minimum distance of Hermitian two-point codes
entry.summary: We prove a formula for the minimum distance of two-point codes on a Hermitian curve.

entry.title: Mass formula for supersingular abelian surfaces
entry.summary: We show a mass formula for arbitrary supersingular abelian surfaces in characteristic $p$.

entry.title: The ternary Goldbach problem with primes from arithmetic progressions
entry.summary: We establish Bombieri-Vinogradov's type result for the number of solutions of the ternary Goldbach problem with primes from arithmetic progressions.

entry.title: On the number zeta(3)
entry.summary: New expansions of the number zeta(3) in continuous fractions are found.

entry.title: Young's Inequality and Fermat's Last Theorem
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author for further investigation.

entry.title: On first case of Fermat's Last Theorem in the spirit of Kummer and Furtwangler
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author [arXiv admin].

entry.title: The binary Goldbach problem with arithmetic weights attached to one of the variables
entry.summary: We study the binary Goldbach problem with arithmetic weights attached to one of the variables.

entry.title: On the linear independence of p-adic L-functions modulo p
entry.summary: Inspired by Warren Sinnott 's method we prove a linear independence result modulo p for the Iwasawa power series associated to Kubota-Leopoldt p-adic L-functions.

entry.title: The ternary Goldbach problem with arithmetic weights attached to two of the variables
entry.summary: We consider the ternary Goldbach problem with two prime variables of the form $k^2+m^2+1$ and find an asymptotic formula for the number of its solutions.

entry.title: A generalization of the duality for finite multiple harmonic q-series
entry.summary: Recently, Bradley studied partial sums of multiple q-zeta values and proved a duality result. In this paper, we present a generalization of his result.

entry.title: Lehmer's type congruences for lacunary harmonic sums
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the Lehmer's type congruences for lacunary harmonic sums.

entry.title: Bounds for the Cubic Weyl Sum
entry.summary: It is shown, subject to the abc-conjecture, that \[\sum_{n\le N}\exp(2\pi i\alpha n^3)\ll_{\epsilon,\alpha}N^{5/7+\epsilon}\] for any $\epsilon>0$ and any quadratic irrational $\alpha$.

entry.title: The densest sequence in the unit circle
entry.summary: We exhibit the densest sequence on the unit circle R/Z, x_k= log(2k-1)/log(2) (mod 1).

entry.title: The Bouniakowsky conjecture and the density of polynomial roots to prime moduli
entry.summary: We establish a result linking the Bouniakowsky conjecture and the density of polynomial roots to prime moduli.

entry.title: Multiplicative Transference Principle
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author.

entry.title: A Generalization of Greenberg's $\Cal L$-invariant
entry.summary: Using the theory of $(\varphi, \Gamma)$-modules we generalizes Greenberg's construction of the $\Cal L$-invariant to semistable representations

entry.title: About certain prime numbers
entry.summary: We give a necessary condition for the existence of solutions of the Diophantine equation $p=x^{q}+ry^{q},$ with $p$, $q$, $r$ distinct odd prime natural numbers.

entry.title: Démonstration de l'Observation 2 d'Almkvist et Zudilin
entry.summary: We prove Obnservation 2 in arXiv:math/0402386 by Gert Almkvist and Wadim Zudilin.

entry.title: On Mean Values of Dirichlet Polynomials
entry.summary: We show a general lower bound for Mean-value of Dirichlet polynomials

entry.title: A note on the generalized Euler numbers and polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper, we derive some interesting symmetric properties for the geenralized Euler numbers and polynomials.

entry.title: Noncommutative L-functions for varieties over finite fields
entry.summary: In this article we prove a Grothendieck trace formula for L-functions of not necessarily commutative adic sheaves.

entry.title: Auxiliary functions in transcendence proofs
entry.summary: We discuss the role of auxiliary functions in the development of transcendental number theory.

entry.title: Perfect Powers: Pillai's works and their developments
entry.summary: After a short introduction to Pillai's work on Diophantine questions, we quote some later developments and we discuss related open problems.
entry.arxiv:comment: Submitted for publication in Pillai's collected papers

entry.title: Compactification projective de Spec Z (d'apres Durov)
entry.summary: This is a very preliminary version of a survey on Durov's PhD thesis. All comments are welcome.

entry.title: Lebesque-Radon-Nikodym theorem with respect to p-adic invariant measure on Zp
entry.summary: In this paper we derive the analogue of Lebesque-Radon Nikody theorem with respect to fermionic p-adic invariant measures on Zp

entry.title: T-adic exponential sums under diagonal base change
entry.summary: Twistec T-adic exponential sums are studied. As an application, the behavior of the L-function under diagonal base chang is explicitely given.

entry.title: Ribet's construction of a suitable cusp eigenform
entry.summary: This article gives a self-contained exposition on Ribet's construction of a Hecke eigenform of weight 2 with certain congruence properties.

entry.title: An explicit PSp_4(3)-polynomial with 3 parameters of degree 40, with an appendix
entry.summary: We construct an explicit PSp_4(3)-polynomial with 3 parameters of degree 40 by using some results of Siegel modular forms.

entry.title: On the image of Euler's totient function
entry.summary: In this article we study certain properties of the image of Euler's totient function; we also consider the structure of the preimage of certain elements of the image of this function.

entry.title: Approximations to two real numbers
entry.summary: Probably we have observed a new simple phenomena dealing with approximations to two real numbers.

entry.title: Riemann-Roch and Riemann-Hurwitz theorems for global fields
entry.summary: In this paper, we use counting theorems from the geometry of numbers to extend the Riemann-Roch theorem and the Riemann-Hurwitz formula to global fields of arbitrary characteristic.

entry.title: Character-free approach to progression-free sets
entry.summary: We present an elementary combinatorial argument showing that the density of a progression-free set in a finite r-dimensional vector space is O(1/r).

entry.title: Non-Additive Prolegomena (to any future Arithmetic that will be able to present itself as a Geometry)
entry.summary: We give a language for geometry which makes curves and number fields look alike.

entry.title: Transformations of Jesus Guillera's formulas for 1/Pi^2
entry.summary: New formulas for 1/Pi^2 are found by transforming Guillera's formulas

entry.title: $B_{\mathrm{Sen}}$ via distributions on weight space
entry.summary: We introduce a certain ring of rigid-analytic distributions on $p$-adic weight space (modulo torsion) and show that it is canonically isomorphic to Colmez's ring $B_{\mathrm{Sen}}$.

entry.title: Critical p-adic L-function
entry.summary: We attach p-adic L-functions to critical modular forms and study them. We prove that those L-functions fit in a two-variables p-adic L-function defined locally everywhere on the eigencurve.

entry.title: On the q-extension of higher-order Euler polynomials
entry.summary: Thw purpose of this paper is to present a systemic study of some families of the generalized q-Euler numbers and polynomials of higher order.

entry.title: Note on multiple q-zeta functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we construct the alternating multiple q-zeta function(= Multiple Euler q-zeta function) and investigate their properties. Finally, we give some interesting functional eauations related to q-Euler polynomials.

entry.title: New identities involving q-Euler polynomials of higher order
entry.summary: In this paper we give new identities involving q-Euler polynomials of higher order.

entry.title: Euler number and polynomials of higher order
entry.summary: In this paper we study the higher-order Euler numbers and polynomials and we introduce the mutiple zeta functions which interpolate higher-order Euler polynomials and numbers at negative integers

entry.title: Simultaneous two-dimensional best Diophantine approximations in the Euclidean norm
entry.summary: We prove a new lower bound for the exponent of growth of the best two-dimensional Diophantine approximations with respect to Euclidean norm.

entry.title: On special Wieferich's primes
entry.summary: We prove that there are no Wieferich's primes $q=2p+1$ where $p \equiv 3 \pmod{4}$ is a prime number

entry.title: Zeros of the Riemann zeta function on the critical line
entry.summary: it is proved that at least 41.28% zeros of the Riemann zeta function are on the critical line

entry.title: A Formula For All K-Gonal Numbers that Are Centered
entry.summary: Fix a positive integer k. In this paper, we give a formula in closed form for all k-polygonal numbers that are also centered k-polygonal.

entry.title: On a theorem of Garza regarding algebraic numbers with real conjugates
entry.summary: We give a new and simple proof of a theorem of Garza estimating the height (or Mahler measure) of an algebraic number with real conjugates.

entry.title: Patterns of primes
entry.summary: In the present work the existence of some patterns of primes is shown which generalize the celebrated result of Green and Tao according to which there are arbitrarily long arithmetic progressions in the sequence of primes

entry.title: Schmidt's conjecture and Badziahin-Pollington-Velani's theorem
entry.summary: We give a simplified exposition of the easiest case of a breakthrough result by D.Badziahin, A.Pollington and S.Velani related to W.M.Schmidt's conjecture.

entry.title: A short proof of an identity for cubic partitions
entry.summary: In this note, we will give a short proof of an identity for cubic partitions.

entry.title: An asymptotic expansion related to the Dickman function
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of Broadurst (arXiv:1004.0519v1) on asymptotic expansions of certain polylogarithm type functions related to the Dickman function.

entry.title: On a conjecture of Sun
entry.summary: We confirm a conjecture of Sun on the expansions of $n(m^k-1)/(m-1)$ in base $m$.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a very preliminary draft

entry.title: More cubic surfaces violating the Hasse principle
entry.summary: We generalize L.J. Mordell's construction of cubic surfaces for which the Hasse principle fails.

entry.title: Some congruences for trinomial coefficients
entry.summary: We prove several congruences for trinomial coefficients.

entry.title: New linear independence measures for values of q-hypergeometric series
entry.summary: We prove linear independence results for values of (a certain class of) q-hypergeometric series in a quantitative form.

entry.title: On a p-adic interpolating function for the multiple generalized Euler numbers and its derivatives
entry.summary: We study analytic function interpolating the multiple generalized Euler numbers attached to $\chi$ at negative integers.

entry.title: On the Rankin-Selberg zeta-function
entry.summary: We obtain the approximate functional equation for the Rankin-Selberg zeta-function on the 1/2-line.

entry.title: Generalized perfect numbers
entry.summary: In this paper some new ways of generalizing perfect numbers are investigated, numerical results are presented and some conjectures are established.

entry.title: Irreducible Compositions of Polynomials over Finite Fields
entry.summary: The paper studies constructions of irreducible polynomials over finite fields using polynomial composition method.

entry.title: On the (h,q)-zeta functions associated with (h,q)-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper we study (h,q)-zeta functions associated with (h,q)-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials.

entry.title: Rational points on diagonal quartic surfaces
entry.summary: We searched up to height $10^7$ for rational points on diagonal quartic surfaces. The computations fill several gaps in earlier lists computed by Pinch, Swinnerton-Dyer, and Bright.

entry.title: On a conjecture concerning the fraction of invertible m-times persymmetric matrices over F_2
entry.summary: In this paper we state that the fraction of invertible m-times persymmetric matrices over F_2 is equal to \prod_{j=1}^{m}(1-2^{-j})

entry.title: q-Bernstein polynomials, q-Stirling numbers and q-Bernoulli polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper, we give new identities involving Phillips q-Bernstein polynomials and we derive some interesting properties of q-Berstein polynomials associated with q-Stirling numbers and q-Bernoulli polynomials.

entry.title: A note on q-Bernstein polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper we constructed new q-extension of Bernstein polynomials. Fron those q-Berstein polynomials, we give some interesting properties and we investigate some applications related this q-Bernstein polynomials.

entry.title: Smooth numbers in short intervals
entry.summary: Assuming the Riemann hypothesis we demonstrate the existence of smooth numbers in certain short intervals.

entry.title: Notes on Cohomology
entry.summary: This work is a collection of old and new aplications of Galois cohomology to the clasification of algebraic and arithmetical objects.

entry.title: A result of Lemmermeyer on class numbers
entry.summary: I present Franz Lemmermeyer's proof that if p is a prime congruent to 9 mod 16 then the class number of Q(p^(1/4)) is congruent to 2 mod 4.

entry.title: Fermat Curves and Brauer-Manin Obstructions
entry.summary: Major mistake. The paper has been withdrawn.
entry.arxiv:comment: Major mistake. The paper has been withdrawn

entry.title: Corrigendum --- Quadratic Class Numbers Divisible by 3
entry.summary: An error in the author's paper (Functiones et Approximatio, 37 . pp. 203-211) is corrected.

entry.title: A note on q-Bernoulli numbers and q-Bernstein polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper we consider the extended q-Bernstein polynomials which are constructed by T. Kim and we investigate some properties.

entry.title: Functional equations for Weng's zeta functions for $(G,P)/\mathbb{Q}$
entry.summary: It is shown that Weng's zeta functions associated with arbitrary semisimple algebraic groups defined over the rational number field and their maximal parabolic subgroups satisfy the functional equations.

entry.title: Ramification in Iwasawa modules
entry.summary: We study properties of ramification in Iwasawa modules.

entry.title: WZ-proofs of "divergent" Ramanujan-type series
entry.summary: We prove some "divergent" Ramanujan-type series for $1/\pi$ and $1/\pi^2$ applying a Barnes-integrals strategy of the WZ-method.

entry.title: Inequalities for Continued Fractions, II
entry.summary: In this paper, we investigate the monotone property of the continued fractions $G(m,\lambda)$ as a function of $m$ and $\lambda$. In particular, we obtain new inequality for the relative continued fractions.

entry.title: Formule de Fateev
entry.summary: A proof of a formula, discovered by V.Fateev, on some Gamma products connected with root systems is given.

entry.title: Enumeration of some particular N-times persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we count the number of some particular n-times persymmetric rank i matrices over F_2.

entry.title: An Alternative Computational Approach to the Collatz Conjecture
entry.summary: An alternative computational approach to the Collatz (3n+1) conjecture is presented that may be theoretically capable of confirming the conjecture.

entry.title: Sparse binary cyclotomic polynomials
entry.summary: We derive a lower and an upper bound for the number of binary cyclotomic polynomials $\Phi_m$ with at most $m^{1/2+\epsilon}$ nonzero terms.

entry.title: Stern's type congruences for L(-k,χ)
entry.summary: We prove several Stern's type congruences for generalized bernoulli numbers.

entry.title: Vector-valued modular forms with an unnatural boundary
entry.summary: We characterize all logarithmic, holomorphic vector-valued modular forms which can be analytically continued to a region strictly larger than the upper half-plane.

entry.title: Linear independence measures for values of certain q-series
entry.summary: We prove, in a quantitative form, linear independence results for values of a certain class of q-series, which generalize classical q-hypergeometric series. These results refine our recent estimates.

entry.title: Exceptional Prime Number Twins, Triplets and Multiplets
entry.summary: A classification of twin primes implies special twin primes. When applied to triplets, it yields exceptional prime number triplets. These generalize yielding exceptional prime number multiplets.

entry.title: On the Determination of the Plancherel measure for Lebedev-Whittaker transforms on GL(n)
entry.summary: We give a simple derivation of the Plancherel measure for Lebedev-Whittaker transforms on GL(n).

entry.title: Closed Forms Evaluations Of Some Exponential Sums
entry.summary: This note provides new closed forms evaluations of a few classes of exponential sums associated with elliptic curves and hyperelliptic curves.

entry.title: Sums with convolution of Dirichlet characters
entry.summary: We improve a recent result by Shparlinski and Banks related to sums with convolution of Dirichlet characters.

entry.title: A note on a perfect Euler cuboid
entry.summary: The problem of constructing a perfect Euler cuboid is reduced to a single Diophantine equation of the degree 12.

entry.title: Special points and Poincaré bi-extensions, with an Appendix by Bas Edixhoven
entry.summary: The paper gives a counter-example to the relative version of the Manin-Mumford conjecture.

entry.title: Congruences for Broken k-Diamond Partitions
entry.summary: We prove two conjectures of Paule and Radu from their recent paper on broken k-diamond partitions.

entry.title: Inequalities for multiplicative arithmetic functions
entry.summary: We study arithmetic inequalities for multiplicative, sub(super)-multiplicative, sub(super)-homogeneous functions. Applications for the classical arithmetic functions are pointed out.

entry.title: On bi-unitary harmonic numbers
entry.summary: We introduce notions of bi-unitary, bi*-unitary and bi**-unitary harmonic numbers, along with their preliminary study.

entry.title: On Random Multiple Dirichlet Series
entry.summary: We study the natural boundary of a random Dirichlet series associated with Goldbach numbers.

entry.title: Asymptotic Large Sieve
entry.summary: Motivated by applications to the study of L-functions, we develop an asymptotic version of the large sieve inequality for linear forms in primitive Dirichlet characters.

entry.title: The exponential sum over squarefree integers
entry.summary: We give an upper bound for the exponential sum over squarefree integers. This establishes a conjecture by Br\"udern and Perelli.

entry.title: Cartier duality for $(φ, \hat{G})$-modules
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove the Cartier duality for $(\phi, \hat{G})$-modules which are defined by Tong Liu to classify semistable Galois representations.

entry.title: A Proof on Hypothesis of Dirichlet Divisor Problem
entry.summary: We have proved that $\triangle(X)=X^{1/4+\epsilon(X)}$, $\epsilon(X)=\frac{c}{\log\log X}$.

entry.title: Enumeration of some particular quadruple persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we count the number of some particular quadruple persymmetric rank i matrices over F_2.

entry.title: Sums of three squareful numbers
entry.summary: We investigate the frequency of positive squareful numbers x,y,z for which x+y=z.

entry.title: On additive and multiplicative arithmetical functions
entry.summary: A characterization of multiplicative (and additive) arithmetical functions is given. Using this characterization, we show that the group of multiplicative arithmetical functions is isomorphic to the group of additive arithmetical functions.

entry.title: A remark on the failure of multiplicity one for GSp(4)
entry.summary: We revisit a classical result of Howe and Pitatski-Shapiro on the failure of strong multiplicity one for $\GSp(4)$.

entry.title: Simple proof of Gallagher's singular series sum estimate
entry.summary: We give a simple method for estimating the average of singular series' associated with prime k-tuples.
entry.arxiv:comment: corrected small typos in the final display

entry.title: Kronecker-Weber via Stickelberger
entry.summary: We give a new proof of the theorem of Kronecker-Weber based on Kummer theory and Stickelberger's theorem.

entry.title: Grün's Theorems and Class Groups
entry.summary: In this article we show how Gr\"un's results in group theory can be used for studying the structure of class groups in normal extensions.

entry.title: Ideal class groups of cyclotomic number fields III
entry.summary: Using an idea going back to Scholz, we construct unramified abelian extensions of cyclotomic extensions of number fields.

entry.title: Euclid's Algorithm in quartic CM-fields
entry.summary: In this note we present techniques to compute inhomogeneous minima of norm forms; as an application, we determine all norm-Euclidean complex bicyclic quartic number fields.

entry.title: New Solutions of $d=2x^3+y^3+z^3$
entry.summary: We discuss finding large integer solutions of $d=2x^3+y^3+z^3$ by using Elsenhans and Jahnel's adaptation of Elkies' LLL-reduction method. We find 28 first solutions for $|d|<10000$.

entry.title: The Bateman-Horn constant for $x^3+x+1$
entry.summary: We evaluate the Bateman-Horn constant for the polynomial $x^3+x+1$.

entry.title: Enumeration of some particular quintuple persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we count the number of some particular quintuple persymmetric rank i matrices over F_2.

entry.title: Logarithmic vector-valued modular forms and polynomial-growth estimates of their Fourier coefficients
entry.summary: We establish (Theorem 3.6) polynomial-growth estimates for the Fourier coefficients of holomorphic logarithmic vector-valued modular forms.

entry.title: The Petersson norm of the Jacobi theta function
entry.summary: We compute the Petersson norm of the Jacobi theta function, by a simple application of the Rankin-Selberg method and a little trick.

entry.title: On the 4-norm of an automorphic form
entry.summary: We prove the optimal upper bound sum || f ||_4^4 << q^{eps} where f runs over an orthonormal basis of Maass cusp forms of prime level q and bounded spectral parameter.

entry.title: On p-adic Speh representations
entry.summary: This note contains new short proofs of known results on Speh representations of inner forms of $GL_n$ over a local non archimedean field of any characteristic.

entry.title: Rational solutions of polynomail-exponential equations
entry.summary: We give description of rational solutions of polynomial-equations.

entry.title: On a problem of Bart Goddard
entry.summary: We find identities for two series proposed by Bart Goddard in terms of elementary functions.

entry.title: Harmonic analysis of the functions $\tildeΔ(x)$ and $N(T)$
entry.summary: In this paper, under the Riemann hypothesis, we study the Fourier analysis about the functions $\tilde{\Delta}(x)$ and $N(T)$ .

entry.title: On Weyl sums over primes in short intervals
entry.summary: The main results extend to sums over primes in a short interval earlier estimates by the author for "long" Weyl sums over primes.

entry.title: On the correlation of the Moebius function with random rank-one systems
entry.summary: We explore the `Moebius disjointness property' in the special context of rank-one transformations and verify this phenomenon for many of the `classical' models

entry.title: Baker's Explicit abc-Conjecture and applications
entry.summary: The conjecture of Masser-Oesterl\'e, popularly known as $abc$-conjecture have many consequences. We use an explicit version due to Baker to solve a number of conjectures.

entry.title: Corrigendum to "Cullen numbers with the Lehmer Property"
entry.summary: In this note, we correct an oversight from the paper mentioned in the title.

entry.title: $p$-adic Zeros of Systems of Quadratic Forms
entry.summary: This survey describes work on the number of variables required to ensure that a system of r quadratic forms over the p-adics has a non-trivial common zero.

entry.title: On Some Improvements of the Brun-Titchmarsh Theorem. IV
entry.summary: We show a new large sieve version of the Brun-Titchmarsh theorem.

entry.title: Some $q$-analogs of congruences for central binomial sums
entry.summary: We establish $q$-analogs for four congruences involving central binomial coefficients. The $q$-identities necessary for this purpose are shown via the $q$-WZ method.

entry.title: Waring's problem in the natural numbers with binary expansions of a special type
entry.summary: Let $\mathbb{N}_0$ be a class of natural numbers whose binary expansions contain even numbers of ones. Waring problem in numbers of class $\mathbb{N}_0$ is solved.

entry.title: Bykovskii's theorem and generalized Larcher's theorem
entry.summary: In this paper we prove a generalization of famous Larchr's theorem concerning good lattice points.
entry.arxiv:comment: Paper on Russian, Sumary in English

entry.title: Singular moduli refined
entry.summary: We prove a refinement of the results of Gross and Zagier on prime factorizations of singular moduli.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Arithmetic Geometry and Automorphic Forms, Advanced Lectures in Mathematics #19 (2011), 367-406

entry.title: An ordinary cyclotomic function field
entry.summary: In this paper, we investigate the $p$-rank of Jacobian of cyclotomic function field $K_m$. Our goal in this paper is to give the necessary and sufficient condition $m$ such that $K_m$ is ordinary.

entry.title: A Large Sieve Inequality for Euler Products
entry.summary: An inequality of Large Sieve type, efficacious in the analytic treatment of Euler products, is obtained.

entry.title: Some 3-adic congruences for binomial sums
entry.summary: We prove some 3-adic congruences for binomial sums, which were conjectured by Sun.

entry.title: An Extension of the Linnik Phenomenon
entry.summary: The Linnik phenomenon concerning the repelling effect of Siegel's zeros is extended to L-functions in a family wider than hitherto considered.

entry.title: Additive twists of Fourier coefficients of GL(3) Maass forms
entry.summary: We prove cancellation in a sum of Fourier coefficents of a GL(3) form $F$ twisted by additive characters, uniformly in the form $F$.

entry.title: On Harrap's conjecture in Diophantine approximation
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture due to Stephen Harrap on inhomogeneous linear Diophantine approximation related to ${\rm BAD}(\alpha,\beta)$ sets.

entry.title: Enumeration of some particular 2N x 9 N-times persymmetric matrices overt F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we count the number of some particular 2n x 9 n-times rank i matrices over F_2.

entry.title: Local Indecomposability of Hilbert Modular Galois Representations
entry.summary: We prove the indecomposability of Galois representation restricted to the p-decomposition group attached to a non CM nearly p-ordinary weight two Hilbert modular form under mild conditions.

entry.title: Goldbach's Problem in Primes with Binary Expansions of a Special Form
entry.summary: Let $\mathbb{N}_0$ be a class of natural numbers whose binary expansions contain even numbers of ones. Goldbach's problem in numbers of class $\mathbb{N}_0$ is solved.

entry.title: Distributions of missing sums and differences
entry.summary: This paper discusses the distributions of missing sums and differences.

entry.title: On the traces of elements of modular group
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture by W. Bergweiler and A. Eremenko on the traces of elements of modular group in this paper

entry.title: The Capitulation Problem in Class Field Theory
entry.summary: This thesis deals with the capitulation problem in class field theory and gives various new insights into the subject.

entry.title: A spectrum associated with Minkowski diagonal continued fraction
entry.summary: We prove a result on the structure of a Diophantine spectrum associated with Minkowski diagonal continued fraction.

entry.title: On the irrationality measure function in average
entry.summary: We study asymptotics for the intergal of irrationality measure functions.
entry.arxiv:comment: Summary in English, fulltext in Russian

entry.title: Correlations of representation functions of binary quadratic forms
entry.summary: This paper extends previous work on linear correlations of representation functions of positive definite binary quadratic forms to allow indefinite forms.

entry.title: πand other formulae implied by hypergeometric summation theorems
entry.summary: By employing certain extended classical summation theorems, several surprising \pi and other formulae are displayed.

entry.title: Explicit constructions of extractors and expanders
entry.summary: We investigate 2-variable expanders and 3-source extractors in prime fields. We extend previous results of J. Bourgain.

entry.title: Density of crystalline points on unitary Shimura varieties
entry.summary: We prove that crystalline points are dense in the spectrum of the completed Hecke algebra on unitary Shimura varieties.

entry.title: Distinct zeros of the Riemann zeta-functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove that there are more than 66.036% of zeros of the Riemann zeta-function are distinct.

entry.title: Enumeration of some particular sextuple persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we count the number of some particular sextuple persymmetric rank i matrices over F_2.

entry.title: From Schanuel's Conjecture to Shapiro's Conjecture
entry.summary: In this paper we prove Shapiro's 1958 Conjecture on exponential polynomials, assuming Schanuel's Conjecture.

entry.title: Equations of Bielliptic Modular Curves
entry.summary: We give a procedure to determine equations for the modular curves $X_0(N)$ which are bielliptic and equations for the 30 values of $N$ such that $X_0(N)$ is bielliptic and nonhyperelliptic are presented.

entry.title: On strong approximation for algebraic groups
entry.summary: This is an expanded version of my talk given at the workshop "Hot Topics: Thin Groups and Super-strong Approximation" (MSRI, Berkeley, February 6-10, 2012).

entry.title: Elliptic dilogarithms and parallel lines
entry.summary: We prove Boyd's conjectures relating Mahler's measures and values of L-functions of elliptic curves in the cases when the corresponding elliptic curve has conductor 14.

entry.title: On the Lambek-Moser Theorem
entry.summary: We suggest an alternative proof of a theorem due to Lambek and Moser using a perceptible model.

entry.title: Some identities involving Gegenbauer polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper we derive some interesting identities arising from the orhtogonality of gegenbauer polynomials.

entry.title: Quaternions and Kudla's matching princple
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove some interesting identities, among average representation numbers (associated to definite quaternion algebras) and `degree' of Hecke correspondences on Shimura curves (associated to indefinite quaternion algebras).

entry.title: On Heilbronn's exponential sum
entry.summary: In the paper we prove a new upper bound for Heilbronn's exponential sum and obtain some applications of our result to distribution of Fermat quotients.

entry.title: Mumford-Tate and Generalised Shafarevich conjectures
entry.summary: In this paper we formulate generalised Isogeny, Mumford-Tate and Shafarevich conjectures and prove that they are equivalent.

entry.title: Inverse Erdos-Fuchs theorem for k-fold sumsets
entry.summary: We generalize a result of Ruzsa on the inverse Erdos-Fuchs theorem for k-fold sumsets.

entry.title: Families of Unramified Extensions of Number Fields
entry.summary: Algebraic methods are used to construct families of unramified abelian extensions of some families of number fields with specified Galois groups.

entry.title: On a conjecture concerning enumeration of 2n x k n-times persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank
entry.summary: In this paper we announce a conjecture concerning enumeration of 2n x k n-times persymmetric matrices over F_2 by rank.

entry.title: On the distance between perfect numbers
entry.summary: It is shown that there exist infinitely many triangular numbers (congruent to 3 mod 12) which cannot be the distance between two perfect numbers.
entry.arxiv:comment: Accepted on J. Comb. Number Theory

entry.title: Endomorphism algebras of QM abelian surfaces
entry.summary: We determine endomorphism algebras of abelian surfaces with quaternion multiplication.

entry.title: Arithmetic of Units in F_q[T]
entry.summary: We study in this note the arithmetic of Taelman's unit module for the ring F_q[T]

entry.title: The Twisted Second Moment of the Dedekind Zeta Function of a Quadratic Field
entry.summary: We compute the second moment of the Dedekind zeta function of a quadratic field times an arbitrary Dirichlet polynomial of length $T^{1/11-\epsilon}$.

entry.title: Combinatorics of the basic stratum
entry.summary: We express the cohomology of the basic stratum of some unitary Shimura varieties associated to division algebras in terms of automorphic representations of the group in the Shimura datum.

entry.title: A prime number theorem for the majority function
entry.summary: In the paper, the occurrence of zeros and ones in the binary expansion of the primes is studied. In particular the statement in the title is established. The proof is unconditional.

entry.title: Monotone Boolean functions capture their primes
entry.summary: It is shown that monotone Boolean functions on the Boolean cube capture the expected number of primes, under he usual identification by binary expansion. This answers a question posed by G.Kalai.

entry.title: Simple zeros of degree 2 L-functions
entry.summary: We prove that the complete L-functions of classical holomorphic newforms have infinitely many simple zeros.

entry.title: Notes on the divisibility of the class numbers of certain imaginary quadratic fields
entry.summary: In this paper, we construct certain infinite families of imaginary quadratic fields whose class number is divisible by a given positive integer.

entry.title: Smooth neighbors
entry.summary: We give a new algorithm that quickly finds smooth neighbors.

entry.title: On Waring's problem: some consequences of Golubeva's method
entry.summary: We investigate sums of mixed powers involving two squares, two cubes, and various higher powers, concentrating on situations inaccessible to the Hardy-Littlewood method.

entry.title: Some Interesting Integer Polynomial Maps
entry.summary: We introduce three simple polynomial maps with integer coefficients that have interesting dynamical properties modulo primes.

entry.title: Integral formulas for a Dirichlet series
entry.summary: We present an integral representation formula for a Dirichlet series whose coefficients are the values of the Liouville's arithmetic function.

entry.title: Identities involving Laguerre polynomials derived from umbral calculus
entry.summary: In this paper, we investigate some identities of Laguerre polynomials involving Bernoulli and Euler polynomials which are derived from umbral calculus.

entry.title: Algebraic cycles and the triangulated category of mixed motives
entry.summary: In this paper, we shall give a candidate for the t-structure on the triangulated category of mixed motives due to Voevodsky.

entry.title: Endoscopy and cohomology growth on U(3)
entry.summary: We apply the endoscopic classification of automorphic forms on U(3) to prove a case of a conjecture of Sarnak and Xue on cohomology growth.

entry.title: Character sums over unions of intervals
entry.summary: We obtain a Burgess-type bound for character sums over unions of intervals. The result follows from the argument of Heath-Brown, with an improvement in one of the steps.

entry.title: Wilson Theorems for Double-, Hyper-, Sub- and Super-factorials
entry.summary: We present generalisations of Wilson's theorem for double factorials, hyperfactorials, subfactorials and superfactorials.

entry.title: L-function and rational points on an elliptic curve via the classical number theory
entry.summary: L-function and rational points on an elliptic curve via the classical number theory.

entry.title: On a Problem in Diophantine Approximation
entry.summary: We prove new results, related to the Littlewood and Mixed Littlewood conjectures in Diophantine approximation.

entry.title: Galois Identities of the three term recurrence
entry.summary: We study the existence of the identity L_n^2 -5F_n^2 = 4(-1)^n.

entry.title: Large gaps between consecutive zeros of the Riemann zeta-function. II
entry.summary: Assuming the Riemann Hypothesis we show that there exist infinitely many consecutive zeros of the Riemann zeta-function whose gaps are greater than 2.9 times the average spacing.

entry.title: Remarks on the error term in Chebotarev Density Theorem
entry.summary: We discuss various effective forms of Chebotarev's density theorem, answering a question of Serre and a question of Murty, Murty and Seradha.

entry.title: Obituary of Graham Everest
entry.summary: Obituary of Graham Everest (1957-2010)
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Bulletin of the London Mathematical Society 45(5): 1110-1118 (2013)

entry.title: Une famille d'applications linéaires liée à l'hypothèse de Riemann généralisée
entry.summary: We exhibit a family of linear operators related to the almost-periodic approach for the generalized Riemann hypothesis.

entry.title: Heights of mixed motives
entry.summary: We define the height of a mixed motive over a number field extending our previous work for pure motives.

entry.title: Bounds of some parameters of elliptic curve on finite field
entry.summary: I prove lower bounds of some parameters of elliptic curve over finite field. There parameters are closely interrelated with cryptographic stability of elliptic curve.

entry.title: On the theorem of Conrey and Iwaniec
entry.summary: An exposition on "Spacing of zeros of Hecke L-functions and the class number problem" by Conrey and Iwaniec; any errors are my own.

entry.title: Artin's Conjecture and systems of diagonal equations
entry.summary: We show that Artin's conjecture concerning p-adic solubility of Diophantine equations fails for infinitely many systems of r homogeneous diagonal equations whenever r>1.

entry.title: On The Multinorm Principle For Finite Extensions
entry.summary: Let L_1 and L_2 be finite abelian extensions of a global field K. We compute the obstruction to the multinorm principle for the pair L_1, L_2.

entry.title: Poly-Cauchy numbers and polynomials with umbral calculus viewpoint
entry.summary: In this paper, we give some interesting identities of poly-Cauchy numbers and polynomials arising from umbral calculus.

entry.title: Incomplete Generalized Fibonacci and Lucas Polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper, we define the incomplete h(x)-Fibonacci and h(x)-Lucas polynomials, we study recurrence relations and some properties of these polynomials

entry.title: An analogue of the prime number theorem for finite fields
entry.summary: We prove an analogue of the prime number theorem for finite fields.

entry.title: On properness of the eigencurve
entry.summary: We prove that the Coleman-Mazur eigencurve is proper (over the weight space) at a large class of points.

entry.title: On Squares in Lucas Sequences
entry.summary: In this short paper, we prove, by only using elementary tools, general cases when $U_n(P,Q) \neq \square$, where $U_n(P,Q)$ is the Lucas sequence of the first type.

entry.title: The Ambiguous Class Number Formula Revisited
entry.summary: We will give a simple proof of the ambiguous class number formula.
entry.arxiv:comment: Journal of the Ramanujan Mathematical Society 2013

entry.title: Tables of record gaps between prime constellations
entry.summary: We present tables of record (maximal) gaps between densest prime constellations, or k-tuplets. The tables contain all maximal gaps between prime k-tuplets up to 10^15, for each k<=7.

entry.title: Diophantine approximation on lines with prime constraints
entry.summary: We study the problem of Diophantine approximation on lines in R^2 with prime numerator and denominator.

entry.title: On Diophantine exponents in dimension 4
entry.summary: We obtain some new inequalities between the ordinary and the uniform Diophantine exponents for simultaneous Diophantine approximation to four real numbers.

entry.title: The fractional parts of Dedekind sums
entry.summary: We show that each rational number $r$, $0\le r<1$, occurs as the fractional part of a Dedekind sum $S(m,n)$.

entry.title: Darmon points on elliptic curves over totally real fields
entry.summary: We show how to construct Darmon points on elliptic curves over totally real fields.

entry.title: On 2-Class field towers of some imaginary quadratic number fields
entry.summary: We construct an infinite family of imaginary quadratic number fields with 2-class groups of type (2,2,2) whose Hilbert 2-class fields are finite.

entry.title: Rational Quartic Reciprocity
entry.summary: We provide a simple proof of the general rational quartic reciprocity law due to Williams, Hardy and Friesen.

entry.title: A Supplement to Scholz's Reciprocity Law
entry.summary: In this note we will present a supplement to Scholz's reciprocity law and discuss applications to the structure of 2-class groups of quadratic number fields.

entry.title: Unramified Quaternion Extensions of Quadratic Number Fields
entry.summary: We show how to construct unramified qoaternion extensions of quadratic number fields.

entry.title: Small Norms in Quadratic Fields
entry.summary: We study elements of small norm in quadratic fields of Riachaud-Degert type.

entry.title: Sur une question de N. Chevallier liée à l'approximation Diophantienne simultanée
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture due to Nicolas Chevallier concerning unimodular matrices related to simultaneous Diophantine approximation to real numbers.

entry.title: Automorphisms of the Affine Line over Nonreduced Rings
entry.summary: We study automorphisms of the affine line over rings like ZZ/p^n.

entry.title: On a class of reducible trinomials
entry.summary: In this short note we give an expression for some numbers $n$ such that the polynomial $x^{2p}-nx^p+1$ is reducible.

entry.title: Approximation pathologies for certain continued fractions
entry.summary: We will provide a family of continued fractions for which there is no correspondence between dynamic and approximation pairs, leading to an anomaly in their corresponding Spaces of Jager Pairs.

entry.title: Mordell-Lang in positive characteristic
entry.summary: We give a new proof of the Mordell-Lang conjecture in positive characteristic for finitely generated subgroups. We also make some progress towards the full Mordell-Lang conjecture in positive characteristic.

entry.title: Strong approximation with Brauer-Manin obstruction for toric varieties
entry.summary: For smooth open toric varieties, we establish strong approximation off infinity with Brauer-Manin obstruction.

entry.title: On truncation of irreducible representations of Chevalley groups II
entry.summary: We determine the growth of the dimension of the slope subspaces of the cohomology of arithmetic subgroups in reductive algebraic groups as a function of the slope.

entry.title: Simplicity of twists of abelian varieties
entry.summary: We give some easy necessary and sufficient criteria for twists of abelian varieties by Artin representations to be simple.

entry.title: Multiplicity One Theorems, S-Version
entry.summary: We proved three theorems of $S$-version of the mulyiplicity one.

entry.title: An Elementary Proof of an Asymptotic Formula of Ramanujan
entry.summary: We derive the mean square of the divisor function using only elementary techniques.

entry.title: A Polynomial Variation on Meinardus' Theorem
entry.summary: We develop a polynomial analogue of Meinardus' Thoerem for bivariate Euler products and apply it to the study of complex multiplicatively weighted partitions.

entry.title: On Diophantine quintuple Conjecture
entry.summary: In this note, we prove that if $\{a,b,c,d,e\}$ with $a<b<c<d<e$ is a Diophantine quintuple, then $d<10^{76}$.

entry.title: Paul Erd\H os and additive bases
entry.summary: This is a survey of some of Erd\H os's work on bases in additive number theory.

entry.title: Sums of Squares Bijective Parameter Representation
entry.summary: We give a bijective parameter representation for a sum of squares of numbers being equal to another sum of squares of numbers.

entry.title: About some split central simple algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we study certain quaternion algebras and symbol algebras which split.

entry.title: A dynamical Mordell Lang property on the disk
