entry.summary: We prove that two finite endomorphisms of the unit disk with degree at least two have orbits with infinite intersections if and only if they have a common iteration.

entry.title: Galois closure of henselization
entry.summary: It is shown that the Galois closure of the henselization of a one dimensional local field arising in geometric and arithmetic situation is separably closed.

entry.title: Corrections to "On continued fractions of given period"
entry.summary: Corrections are brought to an article of Friesen on continued fractions of a given period.

entry.title: Über die rationalen Punkte auf der Sphäre
entry.summary: We give a simple proof of a recent result by Kleinbock and Merrill concerning intrinsic approximations on sphere, in the simplest case of two-dimensional sphere in $\mathbb{R}^3$.

entry.title: Large Even Number Represent The Sum Of Odd Primes
entry.summary: In this paper, I proved that $$N=p_1+p_2+2p_3, p_1\sim N/2, p_2\sim N/2, p_3=o(N),$$ where $N$ is a large even number, and $p_i\ (i=1,2,3)$ are odd primes.

entry.title: On a Lower Bound for $\|(4/3)^k\|$
entry.summary: We prove, that $$ \biggl\|\biggl(\frac43\biggr)^k\biggr\| >\biggl(\frac49\biggr)^k\qquad\text{for}\quad k\ge6, $$ where $\|\cdot\|$ is a distance to the nearest prime.

entry.title: On Polignac's conjecture and arithmetic progressions
entry.summary: In this paper we investigate the recent advances by Zhang, Maynard and Pintz towards Polignac's conjecture and give some new results concerning the relationship between Polignac numbers and arithmetic progressions.

entry.title: Modular case of Levinson's theorem
entry.summary: We evaluate the integral mollified second moment of L-functions of primitive cusp forms and we obtain, for such L-function, an explicit positive proportion of zeros which lie on the critical line.

entry.title: Subconvexity for sup-norms of automorphic forms on PGL(n)
entry.summary: We prove the subconvexity conjecture for sup-norms of automorphic forms for congruence subgroups of SL(n, Z) that satisfy the Ramanujan conjecture at infinity.

entry.title: Vector-Valued Rademacher Sums and Automorphic Integrals
entry.summary: We present bases for certain spaces of meromorphic vector-valued rational-weight mock modular forms constructed using Rademacher sums.

entry.title: Ramanujan-Nagell type equations and perfect numbers
entry.summary: We prove some results on the distance between two perfect numbers using Ramanujan-Nagell type equations.

entry.title: A note on the $l$-fold Bailey Lemma and Mixed Mock Modular forms
entry.summary: In this paper we present a method for constructing multiple-sum $q$-series for what is known as Mixed Mock Modular forms.

entry.title: Computing finite Galois groups arising from automorphic forms
entry.summary: We construct extensions of the field of rational numbers with the Galois group G_2(F_p) by reducing p-adic representations attached to automorphic representations.

entry.title: A note regarding permutation binomials over finite fields
entry.summary: Let $f=ax+x^{r(q-1)+1}\in \mathbb{F}_{q^2}^*[x], r\in \{5,7\}.$ We give explicit conditions on the values $(q,a)$ for which $f$ is a permutation polynomials of $\mathbb{F}_{q^2}.$

entry.title: On a conjecture for Rubin-Stark elements in a special case
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture on Rubin-Stark elements, which was recently proposed by the author, and also by Mazur and Rubin, in a special case.

entry.title: The saturation number for Cayley's cubic surface
entry.summary: We investigate the density of rational points on Cayley's cubic surface whose coordinates have few prime factors. The key tools used are the circle method and universal torsors.

entry.title: Squarefull numbers in arithmetic progression II
entry.summary: In this paper, we improve the error term in a previous paper on an asymptotic formula for the number of squarefull numbers in an arithmetic progression.

entry.title: An Algorithmic Approach to Pick's Theorem
entry.summary: We give an algorithmic proof of Pick's theorem which calculates the area of a lattice-polygon in terms of the lattice-points.

entry.title: What is a period ?
entry.summary: This is an essay about Kontsevich-Zagier periods and their relation to mixed motives a la Madhav Nori.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in the Notices of the AMS, September 2014

entry.title: On Bourgain's bound for short exponential sums and squarefree numbers
entry.summary: We use Bourgain's recent bound for short exponential sums to prove certain independence results related to the distribution of squarefree numbers in arithmetic progressions.

entry.title: Equations of curves with minimal discriminant
entry.summary: In this paper we give an algorithm of how to determine a Weierstrass equation with minimal discriminant for superelliptic curves generalizing work of Tate for elliptic curves and Liu for genus 2 curves.

entry.title: A volume estimate for the set of stable lattices
entry.summary: We show that in high dimensions the set of stable lattices is almost of full measure in the space of unimodular lattices.

entry.title: On an approximate functional equation involving the divisor function
entry.summary: The error term in the approximate functional equation for exponential sums involving the divisor function will be improved under certain conditions for the parameters of the approximate functional equation.

entry.title: Rational Products of Singular Moduli
entry.summary: We determine couples of singular moduli which have rational products

entry.title: On the Sum of a Prime and a Square-free Number
entry.summary: We prove that every integer greater than two may be written as the sum of a prime and a square-free number.

entry.title: A note on the algebra of p-adic multi-zeta values
entry.summary: We prove that the algebra of p-adic multi-zeta values are contained in another algebra which is defined explicitly in terms of series.

entry.title: Uniform distribution of zeroes of $L$-functions of modular forms
entry.summary: We prove under GRH that zeros of $L$-functions of modular forms of level $N$ and weight $k$ become uniformly distributed on the critical line when $N+k\to\infty.$

entry.title: A one-formula proof of the nonvanishing of L-functions of real characters at 1
entry.summary: We present a simple analytic proof that L-functions of real non-principal Dirichlet characters are nonzero at 1.

entry.title: P-adic heights and p-adic Hodge theory
entry.summary: Using the theory of $(\phi,\Gamma)$-modules and the formalism of Selmer complexes we construct the p-adic height for p-adic representations with coefficients in an affinoid algebra over $Q_p$.

entry.title: On theta series attached to the Leech lattice
entry.summary: Some congruence relations satisfied by the theta series associated with the Leech lattice are given.

entry.title: Some notes on Euler products
entry.summary: We focus on a well-known convergence phenomenon, the fact that the $\zeta$ zeros are the universal singularities of certain Euler products.

entry.title: Identifying normal and congruence subgroups
entry.summary: We give a simple algorithm that enables us to determine whether a subgroup of finite index of the Hecke group is normal.

entry.title: Height zeta functions of equivariant compactifications of unipotent groups
entry.summary: We prove Manin's conjecture for bi-equivariant compactifications of unipotent groups.

entry.title: Equidistribution of Frobenius eigenvalues
entry.summary: We study the problem of variation of Frobenius eigenvalues on the cohomology of families of local systems of algebraic curves over finite fields.

entry.title: p-adic L-functions for Rankin-Selberg convolutions over number fields
entry.summary: We unconditionally construct cyclotomic p-adic L-functions for Rankin-Selberg convolutions for GL(n+1) x GL(n) over arbitrary number fields, and show that they satisfy an expected functional equation.

entry.title: Zeckendorf arithmetic for Lucas numbers
entry.summary: In this article we will be dedicated some algorithms of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of two positive integers using Zeckendorf form. Such results find application in coding theory.

entry.title: On the irrationality measure of certain numbers
entry.summary: The paper presents upper estimates for the irrationality measure and the non-quadraticity measure for the numbers $\alpha_k=\sqrt{2k+1}\ln\frac{\sqrt{2k+1}-1}{\sqrt{2k+1}+1}, \ k\in\mathbb N.$

entry.title: Parametric Solutions for a Nearly-Perfect Cuboid
entry.summary: We consider nearly-perfect cuboids (NPC), where the only irrational is one of the face diagonals. Obtained are three rational parametrizations for NPC with one parameter.

entry.title: Exponents of Diophantine approximation
entry.summary: We survey classical and recent results on exponents of Diophantine approximation. We give only a few proofs and highlight several open problems.

entry.title: Wolstenholme again
entry.summary: We give an elementary and self-contained proof of the equivalence of a collection of Wolstenholme-type congruences due to Helou and Terjanian.

entry.title: On binary and quadratic divisor problems
entry.summary: We study the shifted convolution sum of the divisor function and some other arithmetic functions.

entry.title: Automorphism group of split Cartan modular curves
entry.summary: We determine the automorphism group of the split Cartan modular curves $X_{\operatorname{split}}(p)$ for all primes $p$.

entry.title: Supercontinuants
entry.summary: Morier-Genoud, Ovsienko and Tabachnikov introduced supersymmetric frieze patterns (see arXiv:1501.07476). This note gives a solution to Problem 1 from that article: determine the formula for the entries of a superfrieze.

entry.title: Lifting Congruences to weight 3/2
entry.summary: Given a congruence of Hecke eigenvalues between newforms of weight $2$, we prove, under certain conditions, a congruence between corresponding weight-$3/2$ forms.

entry.title: Notes on theta series for Niemeier lattices
entry.summary: Some explicit expressions are given for the theta series of Niemeier lattices. As an application, we present some of their congruence relations.

entry.title: Bounded intervals containing many primes
entry.summary: By combining a sieve method of Harman with the work of Maynard and Tao we show that $$\liminf_{n\rightarrow \infty}(p_{n+m}-p_n)\ll \exp(3.815m).$$

entry.title: Counting dynamical systems over finite fields
entry.summary: We continue previous work to count non-equivalent dynamical systems over finite fields generated by polynomials or rational functions.

entry.title: Elliptic curves over $\mathbb{Q}_\infty$ are modular
entry.summary: We show that if p is a prime, then all elliptic curves defined over the cyclotomic Z_p extension of Q are modular.

entry.title: Moebius transforms and cyclic equations
entry.summary: We present a simple method for the construction of polynomials with cyclic Galois groups, hoping to encourage a reader with some background in algebra to make computations of his/her own.

entry.title: On Cornacchia's Algorithm
entry.summary: We give an endorsement for Cornacchia's famous algorithm. Thus we do not claim anything new but an approach which is supposed to be simpler than those of previous works written with the same aim.

entry.title: On the lower bound of the discrepancy of (t; s) sequences: I
entry.summary: We find the exact lower bound of the discrepancy of shifted Niedereiter's sequences.

entry.title: Patterns in numbers and infinite sums and products
entry.summary: In this article we propose a general method of obtaining infinite sums of products with functions that count patterns in numbers.

entry.title: Primality tests for specific classes of $N=k\cdot 2^m \pm 1$
entry.summary: Polynomial time primality tests for specific classes of numbers of the form $k\cdot 2^m \pm 1$ are introduced.

entry.title: A Corrigendum to Unreasonable Slightness
entry.summary: We revisit Bogdan Nica's 2011 paper, The Unreasonable Slightness of E2 over Imaginary Quadratic Rings, and correct an inaccuracy in his proof.

entry.title: On some instances of Fox's Integral Equation
entry.summary: We consider some applications of the non-homogeneous second order integral equation of Fox. Some new solutions to Fox's integral equation are discussed in relation to number theory.

entry.title: A $q$-Digital Binomial Theorem
entry.summary: We present a multivariable generalization of the digital binomial theorem from which a q-analog is derived as a special case.

entry.title: The Rodriguez-Villegas type congruences for truncated q-hypergeometric functions
entry.summary: We prove some Rodriguez-Villegas type congruences for truncated q-hypergeometric functions.

entry.title: A simple twisted relative trace formula
entry.summary: In this article we derive a simple twisted relative trace formula.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is an old paper uploaded for archival purposes

entry.title: On degenerate Carlitz q-Bernoulli polynomials
entry.summary: In this paper, we consider the degenerate Carlitz q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials and we investigate some properties of those polynomials.

entry.title: More about additive representation functions for integers
entry.summary: A short comment about a recent note by Kiss and Sandor on the maximum values of additive representation functions.

entry.title: Ramanujan's identities, minimal surfaces and solitons
entry.summary: Using Ramanujan's identities and the Weierstrass-Enneper representation of minimal surfaces and the analogue for Born-Infeld solitons, we derive further non-trivial identities.

entry.title: Pell Numbers whose Euler Function is a Pell Number
entry.summary: In this paper, we show that the only Pell numbers whose Euler function is also a Pell number are $1$ and $2$.

entry.title: Some experiments on Bateman-Horn
entry.summary: We describe some studies related to the frequency of prime values of integer polynomials.

entry.title: Height of Some Automorphisms of Local Fields
entry.summary: In this note, we determine which automorphism subgroups of $\mathrm{Aut}_{\mathbb{F}_q}(\mathbb{F}_q((x)))$ are corresponding to $\mathbb{Z}_p$-extensions or $\mathbb{Z}_p\times\mathbb{Z}_p$-extensions of characteristic $0$ fields.

entry.title: Pell Numbers with Lehmer property
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove that there is no number with the Lehmer property in the sequence of Pell numbers.

entry.title: Rational Points on the Intersection of Three Quadrics
entry.summary: This paper proves the Hasse principle and weak approximation for varieties defined by the smooth intersection of three quadratics in at least 19 variables, over arbitrary number fields.

entry.title: Explicit Chen's theorem
entry.summary: We show that every even number $>\exp\exp 36$ can be represented as the sum of a prime and a product of at most two primes.

entry.title: Families of Cyclic Cubic Fields
entry.summary: We describe a procedure for generating families of cyclic cubic fields with explicit fundamental units. This method generates all known families and gives new ones.

entry.title: Quasipolynomial Solutions to the Hofstadter Q-Recurrence
entry.summary: In 1991, Solomon Golomb discovered a quasilinear solution to Hofstadter's Q-recurrence. In this paper, we construct eventual quasipolynomial solutions of all positive degrees to Hofstadter's recurrence.

entry.title: On the Andrews-Zagier asymptotics for partitions without sequences
entry.summary: We establish the asymptotic behavior of the Andrews $G_k(q)$ function as $q\to 1.$

entry.title: Multiplicative functions preserving the sum-of-three-squares operation
entry.summary: If a multiplicative function $f$ satisfies $f(a^2+b^2+c^2) = f(a)^2+f(b)^2+f(c)^2$ for all positive integers $a$, $b$, and $c$, then $f$ is an identity function.

entry.title: On triple correlations of divisor functions
entry.summary: We prove an asymptotic formula with power saving error term for a certain triple divisor sum.

entry.title: A note on lattice points in certain finite type domains in $\mathbb{R}^d$
entry.summary: We study the Fourier transforms of indicator functions of some special high-dimensional finite type domains and obtain estimates of the associated lattice point discrepancy.

entry.title: Some symmetric $q$-congruences
entry.summary: We prove some symmetric $q$-congruences.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11 pages. This is a very very preliminary manuscript. And some results will be added in the future verisions

entry.title: Proof of the conjecture of Keskin, Siar and Karaatli
entry.summary: In this paper among other results, we will prove the conjecture of Keskin, Siar and Karaatli on the Diophantine equation $x^{2}-kxy+y^{2}-2^{n}=0$.

entry.title: On the Vinogradov mean value
entry.summary: A discussion of recent work of C.Demeter, L.Guth and the author of the proof of the Vinogradov Main Conjecture using the decoupling theory for curves

entry.title: Geometrization of the local Langlands correspondence: an overview
entry.summary: This article is an overview of the geometrization conjecture for the local Langlands correspondence formulated by the author.

entry.title: A double-inductive proof of Moessner's theorem
entry.summary: We present a proof of Moessner's theorem by double induction, using only basic rules of arithmetic. No prerequisite knowledge is assumed.

entry.title: Primes in arithmetic progressions to spaced moduli.III
entry.summary: We obtain the analog of the Bombieri-Vinogradov theorem for square moduli up to any power of x less than 1/2.

entry.title: The prime counting function
entry.summary: The theorem below gives another way of computing the distribution prime counting function without using recursion and the values of Prime numbers

entry.title: Multiplicative Function Mean Values: Asymptotic Estimates
entry.summary: Classical mean-value results of Wirsing type in analytic number theory are established under weaker than classical conditions.

entry.title: Twisted characteristic $p$ zeta functions
entry.summary: We propose a "twisted" variation of zeta functions introduced by David Goss in 1979.

entry.title: Lower bounds on the two-sided inhomogeneous approximation constant
entry.summary: We give lower bounds on the case of worst inhomogeneous approximation.

entry.title: On the inhomogeneous spectrum of period two quadratics
entry.summary: We give a complete description of the inhomogeneous spectrum of period two quadratics down to the first limit point.

entry.title: Modular Curves with many Rational Points
entry.summary: Using classical and non split modular curves we improve many lower bounds for the maximum number of points in a curve over finite fields.

entry.title: Improved bounds for Fourier coefficients of Siegel modular forms
entry.summary: The goal of this paper is to improve existing bounds for Fourier coefficients of higher genus Siegel modular forms of small weight.

entry.title: The analytic class number formula for orders in products of number fields
entry.summary: We derive an analytic class number formula for an arbitrary order in a product of number fields.

entry.title: Counterexamples to a conjecture of Woods
entry.summary: A conjecture of Woods from 1972 is disproved.

entry.title: Fermat's Last Theorem: Algebra and Number Theory
entry.summary: In our work we give the examples using Fermat's Last Theorem for solving some problems from algebra and number theory.

entry.title: Measure Theoretic Aspects Of Error Terms
entry.summary: This thesis investigates on measure theoretic aspects of fluctuations of error terms appearing in various asymptotic formulas.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a Ph.D. thesis submitted to Homi Bhabha National Institute

entry.title: A database of Hilbert modular forms
entry.summary: We describe the computation of tables of Hilbert modular forms of parallel weight 2 over totally real fields.

entry.title: Analogues of the Ramanujan--Mordell Theorem
entry.summary: The Ramanujan--Mordell Theorem for sums of an even number of squares is extended to other quadratic forms and quadratic polynomials.

entry.title: Congruent numbers on the right trapezoid
entry.summary: We introduce and study a new kind of congruent number problem on the right trapezoid.

entry.title: A presentation of PGL(2,Q)
entry.summary: We give a conjectural presentation of the infinitely generated group PGL(2,Q) with an infinite list of relators.

entry.title: On some remarkable congruences between two elliptic curves
entry.summary: We exhibit two non-isogenous rational elliptic curves with $17$-torsion subgroups isomorphic as Galois modules.

entry.title: Diophantine exponents of lattices
entry.summary: In this paper we define Diophantine exponents of lattices and investigate some of their properties. We prove transference inequalities and construct some examples with the help of Schmidt's subspace theorem.

entry.title: Applications of some exponential sums on prime powers: a survey
entry.summary: A survey paper on some recent results on additive problems with prime powers.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Rivista di Matematica della Universita di Parma, volume 7, pages 19-37, 2016

entry.title: Attainable numbers and the Lagrange spectrum
entry.summary: The paper is devoted to the properties of the Lagrange spectrum left endpoints and so-called attainable numbers.

entry.title: On the continuous binomial coefficients by L. Cano and R. Diaz
entry.summary: Here are exhibited some additional results about the continuous binomial coefficients as introduced by L. Cano and R. Diaz in [1].

entry.title: Linear correlations of multiplicative functions
entry.summary: We prove a Green--Tao theorem for multiplicative functions.
entry.arxiv:comment: 28 pages; small correction in proof of Lemma 10.1

entry.title: On pair correlation for generic diagonal forms
entry.summary: We establish new pair correlation results for certain generic homogenous diagonal forms evaluated on the integers. Methods are analytic leading to explicit quantitative statements.

entry.title: General proof for irrationality of infinite sums based on Fourier's proof
entry.summary: In this paper we review a general proof for the irrationality property of numbers which take a certain form of infinite sums.

entry.title: $GL_2$-real analytic Eisenstein series twisted by parameter matrices and multiplicative integral quasi-characters
entry.summary: In this monograph, we study in detail a special class of $GL_2$-real analytic Eisenstein series.

entry.title: Quadratic Equations in Three Variables over Gaussian Integers
entry.summary: We develop an algebraic method of studying of Diophantine quadratic equations in three variables over the ring of Gaussian integers.

entry.title: Imaginary Multiquadratic Fields of Class Number 1
entry.summary: In this paper, we present a complete classification of all imaginary $n$-quadratic fields of class number 1.

entry.title: An iteration based on prime and composite factors
entry.summary: A discrete map based on the sum of an integer's distinct primes factors and the sum of its other factors is defined and its iteration is studied.

entry.title: On the Erdos-Fuchs theorem
entry.summary: We prove several extensions of the Erdos-Fuchs theorem.

entry.title: Quantum unique ergodicity of degenerate eisenstein series on gl(n)
entry.summary: We prove quantum unique ergodicity for a subspace of the continuous spectrum spanned by the degenerate Eisenstein Series on GL(n).

entry.title: The Manin-Peyre conjecture for a certain biprojective cubic threefold
entry.summary: The conjectures of Manin and Peyre are confirmed for a certain threefold.

entry.title: Convolution identities for Tetranacci numbers
entry.summary: We give convolution identities without binomial coefficients for Tetranacci numbers and convolution identities with binomial coefficients for Tetranacci and Tetranacci-type numbers.

entry.title: A note on the Schrodinger maximal function
entry.summary: It is shown that control of the Schrodinger maximal functions $\sup_{0<t<1}|e^{it\Delta} f|$ for $f\in H^s(\mathbb R^n)$ requires $s\geq \frac n{2(n+1)}$

entry.title: Nombre de résidus quadratiques d'un nombre entier inférieurs à sa moitié
entry.summary: We propose a criterion that allows one to distinguish prime numbers from compound ones. This criterion is based on the counting of small quadratic residues.

entry.title: Higher order divisor problems
entry.summary: An asymptotic formula is proved for the k-fold divisor function averaged over homogeneous polynomials of degree k in k-1 variables coming from incomplete norm forms.

entry.title: Unbounded twists of Hooley's $Δ$-function
entry.summary: We prove tight estimates for averages of the twisted Hooley $\Delta$-function over arbitrary number fields.

entry.title: Integrality estimates in orbits over function fields
entry.summary: We prove a version of Silverman's dynamical integral point theorem for a large class of rational functions defined over global function fields.

entry.title: Sub-Shimura Varieties for type O(2,n)
entry.summary: We give a classification, up to consideration of component groups, of sub-Shimura varieties of those Shimura Varieties attached to orthogonal groups of signature (2,n) over Q.

entry.title: Bilateral sums related to Ramanujan-like series
entry.summary: We define bilateral series related to Ramanujan-like series for $1/\pi^2$. Then, we conjecture a property of them and give some applications.

entry.title: Dougall's $_5F_4$ sum and the WZ-algorithm
entry.summary: We show how to prove the examples of a paper by Chu and Zhang using the WZ-algorithm.

entry.title: Asymptotic density of Motzkin numbers modulo small primes
entry.summary: We establish the asymptotic density of the Motzkin numbers modulo small primes.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages. Added further references and acknowledgements of previous work

entry.title: Diophantine approximation on lines in $\mathbb{C}^2$ with Gaussian prime constraints
entry.summary: We study the problem of Diophantine approximation on lines in $\mathbb{C}^2$ with numerators and denominators restricted to Gaussian primes.

entry.title: One class genera of lattice chains over number fields
entry.summary: We classify all one-class genera of admissible lattice chains of length at least 2 in hermitian spaces over number fields.

entry.title: Structure and asymptotics for Motzkin numbers modulo small primes using automata
entry.summary: We establish the asymptotic density and some structure results for the Motzkin numbers modulo primes up to 29 using automata.

entry.title: Prime geodesic theorem of Gallagher type
entry.summary: We reduce the exponent in the error term of the prime geodesic theorem for compact Riemann surfaces from $\frac{3}{4}$ to $\frac{7}{10}$ outside a set of finite logarithmic measure.

entry.title: A note on Dirichlet $L$-functions
entry.summary: We study the relation between the size of $L(1,\chi)$ and the width of the zero-free interval to the left of that point.

entry.title: Harmonic Eisenstein Series of Weight One
entry.summary: In this short note, we will construct a harmonic Eisenstein series of weight one, whose image under the $\xi$-operator is a weight one Eisenstein series studied by Hecke.

entry.title: Irreducible characters with bounded root Artin conductor
entry.summary: In this work, we prove that the growth of the Artin conductor is at most, exponential in the degree of the character.

entry.title: Consecutive square-free numbers of a special form
entry.summary: In the present paper we give an asymptotic formula for the number of pairs of consecutive square-free numbers of a special form.

entry.title: Supercongruences between truncated ${}_3F_2$ hypergeometric series
entry.summary: We establish four supercongruences between truncated ${}_3F_2$ hypergeometric series involving $p$-adic Gamma functions, which extend some of the Rodriguez-Villegas supercongruences.
